de.fhb.sailboat.communication
Class CommTCPServer

java.lang.Object
  de.fhb.sailboat.communication.CommunicationBase
      de.fhb.sailboat.communication.CommTCPServer

public class CommTCPServer
extends CommunicationBase

Provides a TCP server endpoint as CommunicationBase.
Although it defines a TCP server, it can be interpreted as peer to peer connection because just one client is accepted at a time.
Further connection attempts are discarded.

Author:
Michael Kant
